sense.def:
A bit of something
je majhna količina ali del nečesa;

seg.quote: I really enjoyed your letter, especially the bits about Dr O’Shea.

sense.def:
V računalništvu je
a bit
najmanjša podatkovna enota, spravljena v spominu računalnika.

Bit
je tudi pretekli čas glagola
to bite
.

A bit
pomeni v majhnem obsegu ali stopnji;

Z izrazom
a bit of
omilimo izjavo. Na primer: stavek
It's a bit of a nuisance
zveni bolj blago kakor
It's a nuisance
.

seg.quote: It's asking a bit much to expect a lift.

sense.def:
Kadar rečemo, da je nekaj
every bit as good, interesting, or worthwhile as something else
, poudarimo, da je ravno tako dobro ali zanimivo kot nekaj drugega.

seg.quote: She wanted to prove to them that she was every bit as clever as they were.

sense.def:
To do something for a bit
pomeni, da tisto delamo kratek čas;

seg.quote: Why can't we stay here for a bit?

cit.quote: niti malo, niti najmanj, niti približno tako kot

seg.quote: It was all very clean and tidy, not a bit like his back garden.

sense.def:
Quite a bit of something
je velika količina nečesa;

seg.quote: ...a rich Irishman who's made quite a bit of money.
